name: My 🍓 cheesecake is bomb! 🤯 v1
description:
This is the BEST Strawberry Cheesecake recipe I've made to date! A nice natural cheesecake base smothered with a strawberry compote with pieces of strawberry mixed into the sauce.

Cheesecake base: WF Strawberry Cheesecake, OOO Vanilla Custard Cheesecake (ties it all together), TPA Cheesecake Graham Crust

Strawberry 🍓 Compote: WF Strawberry Gummy Candy, FA Juicy Strawberry, TPA Strawberry Ripe (provides the fresh strawberry pieces) 

Give it a mix & let me know what you think 🧐 I'm on day 3 of the steep and I can't stop vaping it! 🤤🤤🤤 Sweetener is a necessity for me but feel free to add or remove your own... Hope y'all enjoy it as much as I do! 🍓🤩🍓

The cheesecake may become a bit fuller and cheeseier by day 5 or it may need a tweak...
WF Marscapone Cheese at . 25% 🤔

Be on the 👀 for v2... 👊
author: KylezKloudz
